name: Caverrion
description:
Caverrion is an 2D action-platformer with some souls-like elements. The game was developed by me for the upper secondary school project which is the final and most important work done in Swedish upper secondary school. The game was developed during five-ish months. I originally planed to have six levels instead of three, however I decided to reduce it in order to have more time to polish the combat mechanics. If there is an interest I will probably expand amount. Feedback and constructive criticism would be highly appreciated! Thank you for playing! :)

Soundtrack is found here: 

https://soundcloud.com/moa-rosengren-534418833/sets/caverrion-soundtrack

Features
  • Exciting vaguely souls-like combat!
  • 1 boss battle!
  • Controller support
  • Built in speedrun timer!
  • Three(!) whole levels! 
  • 10+ minutes of gameplay!!
  • Original soundtrack!
